column4: <djm62> if u go to ur nautilus file browser Edit->Prefs->Media, it will let you open certain programs upon mounting.  I was thinking about trying Rythm Box w/ my phone/mp3 but haven't gotten around to it, so don't know for sure
ok, thanks! that's half of the problem... the other thing is the actual sync

Ha! it's not particularly obvious, but it works beautifully: you need to create a file named ".is_audio_player" in the root directory, the rest is automatic if you want your phone to be counted as an audio player
not so much for you as for anyone googling the logs, btw ;-)
